verses.verse: And these are the inheritances which the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5157>took<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>, which <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>, and <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, and the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, distributed unto <S%H5157>them<s%>,

by the <S%H1486>lot<s%> of their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, for the <S%H8672>nine<s%> <S%H4294>tribes<s%>, and for <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H4294>half-tribe<s%>.

For <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H5414>given<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4294>tribes<s%> and <S%H2677>the<s%> <S%H4294>half-tribe<s%> <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%>: but unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> no <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> among <S%H8432>them<s%>.

For the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4294>tribes<s%>, <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>: and they <S%H5414>gave<s%> no <S%H2506>portion<s%> unto the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%>, save <S%H5892>cities<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H4054>in<s%>, with the suburbs thereof for their <S%H4735>cattle<s%> and for their <S%H7075>substance<s%>.
As <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, so the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%>; and they <S%H2505>divided<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>.

Then the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H5066>drew<s%> nigh unto <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> in <S%H1537>Gilgal<s%>: and <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> the <S%H7074>Kenizzite<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3045>him<s%>, Thou knowest the <S%H1697>thing<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> concerning <S%H182>me<s%> and concerning <S%H182>thee<s%> in <S%H6947>Kadesh-barnea<s%>.

Forty <S%H705><s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> was I when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H5650>servant<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me from <S%H6947>Kadesh-barnea<s%> to spy <S%H7270>out<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>; and I <S%H7725>brought<s%> him <S%H1697>word<s%> <S%H7725>again<s%> as it was in my <S%H3824>heart<s%>.

Nevertheless my <S%H251>brethren<s%> that went <S%H5927>up<s%> with me made the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H4529>melt<s%>; but I <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Surely the <S%H776>land<s%> whereon thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> hath <S%H1869>trodden<s%> shall be an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> to thee and to thy <S%H1121>children<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>, because thou hast <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H3068>now<s%>, behold, Jehovah hath kept me <S%H2421>alive<s%>, as he <S%H1696>spake<s%>, these <S%H705>forty<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, from the <S%H227>time<s%> that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> this <S%H1697>word<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, while <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: and <S%H3117>now<s%>, lo, I am this day <S%H8084>fourscore<s%> and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%>.

As yet I am as <S%H2389>strong<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%> as I as in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3581>me<s%>: as my strength was <S%H3581>then<s%>, even so is my strength <S%H4421>now<s%>, for war, and to go <S%H3318>out<s%> and to come <S%H935>in<s%>.

Now therefore <S%H5414>give<s%> me this <S%H2022>hill-country<s%>, whereof <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%>; for thou <S%H8085>heardest<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> how the <S%H6062>Anakim<s%> were <S%H5892>there<s%>, and cities <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H1219>fortified<s%>: it may be that <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will <S%H194>be<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H3423>me<s%>, and I shall drive them out, as <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%>.
And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> <S%H5414>him<s%>; and he gave <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> unto <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>.

Therefore <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> became the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%> the <S%H7074>Kenizzite<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>; because that he <S%H4390>wholly<s%> <S%H310>followed<s%> <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

Now the <S%H8034>name<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron<s%> <S%H6440>beforetime<s%> was <S%H7153>Kiriath-arba<s%>; which Arba was the <S%H1419>greatest<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> among the <S%H6062>Anakim<s%>. And the <S%H776>land<s%> had <S%H8252>rest<s%> from <S%H4421>war<s%>.
